title: Ep. 396: Moisture Sandwich, Aging Police, Wedding Hairstyles & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:title: Ep. 396: Moisture Sandwich, Aging Police, Wedding Hairstyles & The Week’s Beauty News
description:
Jess shares the ultimate technique for dewy skin, which she learned from a recent date with Rihanna-approved aesthetician Sean Garrette, the new Dior skincare expert. Plus, we talk about why we continue to judge celebrities’ aesthetic choices (please see: 26-year-old Ireland Baldwin’s recent FaceTite procedure); our favorite hairstyle for brides; a Nivea moisturizer that literally makes the air cleaner; new beauty campaigns that aim to spread kindness; and a bargain ($7) dry shampoo that's as good as the fancy stuff.

  • Shop the products mentioned on Ep. 396: shopmyshelf.us/collections/46359
  • Links and sponsor promo codes: fatmascara.com/blog
  • Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara Raising a Wand
  • Social media: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit
  • Submit a "Raise A Wand" product recommendation and be featured on the show: email info@fatmascara.com or leave a voicemail at 646-481-8182

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
